page.shortlink: form layout control container container item value property

discussion.p: The *[ui:Container item value]* property defines the value to pass to the item for the container. The value can reference fields in the FormView control using curly-brace syntax. For example:

section.description: This will pass in the value of the latitude and longitude fields to the events for the item. In the onClick event for the item, the value is available in the *[js:v]* variable. For example:
section.example: alert("You clicked the map! Value: " + v);

section.description: When the container that has been assigned the item is clicked, it displays the alert with the latitude and longitude values:
